round_best: Develop a multimodal generative adversarial network (GAN) model that leverages dual learning mechanisms—one for text and the other for images—to ensure consistency and relevance between the written content and visual content of recipes. The model will use a feedback loop where the text generator uses outputs from the image generator as context and vice versa, fine-tuning both generators through iterative refinement to better align the text with the corresponding visuals. This alignment can be further enhanced by training the model on a dataset curated with expert annotations on the quality and relevance of the text-image pairs.
